memberdef.type: *ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific and the this profile is compliant wit ALPW DataExchange Service[MOD] some typo in comments *ALPW_BLESDK for specific it is done during linkUP and configurable via the BLEALPWDATAEXCHANGE_CLIENT_SERVERTXCONFIGURATION configuration option *ALPW_BLESDK for specific these version are better in memory optimization[MOD] The applications projects now set the REMOVEUNUSED linker option in order to save ROM footprint[MOD] The applications projects now set the global register coloring and code packing compiler option in order to save ROM footprint[MOD] The applications have been updated to fix some warning and typo in source code[MOD] The applications project linker overlay option have been it reflect now exactly the stack internal call it has been reordered also in important note txt file *ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific all the modifications are concerning the sample application that have been improved[FIX] An issue where the ALPWISE data exchange prototype callback was not all the modifications are concerning the sample application that have been improved There is a change related to the Core Stack configuration management[MOD] ATT and Core stack configuration have been merged into the single configuration file bleCustomConfig h so sample applications does not include anymore the attcustomconfig h but only bleCustomConfig h bleCustomConfig h contains ATT configuration and a Core Stack SYSTEM API
memberdef.definition: * ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific and the this profile is compliant wit ALPW DataExchange Service [MOD] some typo in comments* ALPW_BLESDK for specific it is done during linkUP and configurable via the BLEALPWDATAEXCHANGE_CLIENT_SERVERTXCONFIGURATION configuration option* ALPW_BLESDK for specific these version are better in memory optimization [MOD] The applications projects now set the REMOVEUNUSED linker option in order to save ROM footprint [MOD] The applications projects now set the global register coloring and code packing compiler option in order to save ROM footprint [MOD] The applications have been updated to fix some warning and typo in source code [MOD] The applications project linker overlay option have been it reflect now exactly the stack internal call it has been reordered also in important note txt file* ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific all the modifications are concerning the sample application that have been improved [FIX] An issue where the ALPWISE data exchange prototype callback was not all the modifications are concerning the sample application that have been improved There is a change related to the Core Stack configuration management [MOD] ATT and Core stack configuration have been merged into the single configuration file bleCustomConfig h so sample applications does not include anymore the attcustomconfig h but only bleCustomConfig h bleCustomConfig h contains ATT configuration and a Core Stack SYSTEM API change
memberdef.name: change

memberdef.definition: * ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific and the this profile is compliant wit ALPW DataExchange Service [MOD] some typo in comments* ALPW_BLESDK for specific it is done during linkUP and configurable via the BLEALPWDATAEXCHANGE_CLIENT_SERVERTXCONFIGURATION configuration option* ALPW_BLESDK for specific these version are better in memory optimization [MOD] The applications projects now set the REMOVEUNUSED linker option in order to save ROM footprint [MOD] The applications projects now set the global register coloring and code packing compiler option in order to save ROM footprint [MOD] The applications have been updated to fix some warning and typo in source code [MOD] The applications project linker overlay option have been it reflect now exactly the stack internal call it has been reordered also in important note txt file* ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific all the modifications are concerning the sample application that have been improved [FIX] An issue where the ALPWISE data exchange prototype callback was not all the modifications are concerning the sample application that have been improved There is a change related to the Core Stack configuration management [MOD] ATT and Core stack configuration have been merged into the single configuration file bleCustomConfig h so sample applications does not include anymore the attcustomconfig h but only bleCustomConfig h bleCustomConfig h contains ATT configuration and a Core Stack SYSTEM API so the SYSTEM APIs SYSTEM_CreateTimer now takes U32 as parameter and SYSTEM_TimerGetRemain now return U32* ALPW_BLESDK for specific changes
memberdef.name: changes

memberdef.type: ALPWISE BLESW_ALPWDataExchange Profile Release Notes this release Note is general for all the SDK and some changes are specific for a SDK This Notes includes changes for Profile and SDK specific sample application KNOWN ISSUES AND LIMITATIONS none REVISION
memberdef.definition: ALPWISE BLESW_ALPWDataExchange Profile Release Notes this release Note is general for all the SDK and some changes are specific for a SDK This Notes includes changes for Profile and SDK specific sample application KNOWN ISSUES AND LIMITATIONS none REVISION HISTORY
memberdef.name: HISTORY
memberdef.initializer:
============================================================================= 1.0.7 =============================================================================
* Profile changes:
[MOD] The ALPWISE DATA Exchange SERVER Rx Characteristic is now allowed to receive Write Without Response Commands. It allows a CLIENT to be able to send data in an non reliable way.
[MOD] API Change : BLEALPWDATAEXCHANGE_CLIENT_SendData now takes an extra parameter to provide type of packet (reliable/not reliable) used when sending this data packet. If you want to keep the same behavior as before specify BLEALPWDATAEXCHANGE_CLIENT_DATA_RELIABLE as parameter. The non Reliable packets allow a better bit rate

memberdef.definition: * ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific and the specification
memberdef.name: specification

memberdef.type: *ALPW_BLESDK for x86 specific and the this profile is compliant wit ALPW DataExchange Service[MOD] some typo in comments *ALPW_BLESDK for specific it is done during linkUP and configurable via the BLEALPWDATAEXCHANGE_CLIENT_SERVERTXCONFIGURATION configuration option *ALPW_BLESDK for specific these version are better in memory optimization[MOD] The applications projects now set the REMOVEUNUSED linker option in order to save ROM footprint[MOD] The applications projects now set the global register coloring and code packing compiler option in order to save ROM footprint[MOD] The applications have been updated to fix some warning and typo in source code[MOD] The applications project linker overlay option have been it reflect now exactly the stack internal call
